scene_description_enriched: A male figure, identified as Saint Paul by his attributes, stands with his eyes closed and head bowed, suggesting contemplation or suffering. He wears a pink outer robe over a green undergarment and a blue tunic. His right hand rests on the hilt of a large sword, a symbol of his martyrdom. He holds a red book in his left hand. The background is a deep blue, adorned with golden rays emanating from above and scattered golden clouds, indicating a divine or heavenly setting. The lower portion of the image depicts a green, grassy ground with small golden floral motifs.
